project_descr: Promoting Access to Clean Energy Services in St. Vincent

outputs.output_descr: The purpose of the PPG is to develop a (Medium-sized Project) MSP proposal that will engage stakeholders and will support specific studies and analyses which will result in the preparation of the full documentation of the Global Environment Facility (GEF)-funded and UNDP-supported project “Promoting access to clean energy services in St Vincent”. This preparatory phase aims at finalizing the studies and arrangements for the submission of this MSP proposal to the GEF. The PPG will also enable the stakeholders’ consultations and data collection for the establishment of baseline and complementary
